snippet.title: UNBEATABLE [white label] Game Trailer
snippet.description:
UNBEATABLE [white label] - Action, Adventure, Indie game by D-CELL GAMES - A young girl learns a song. An exclusive side-story set in the world of D-CELL GAMES' debut work.

ABOUT THIS GAME: 
LOSE YOUR WAY. FIND YOUR VOICE.

UNBEATABLE [white label] is a special episode set in the world of UNBEATABLE. Every week during the length of UNBEATABLE's crowdfunding campaign (from April 6 to May 7), [white label] will be updated featuring new story content and beatmaps, eventually finishing a complete stand-alone narrative.FEATURES:

 Visually stunning, heart-pumping, anime-inspired combat.

Battle to the beat however and whenever you want in the ARCADE MODE.

New story and songs releasing every week from April 6th-May 7th, including a couple of special surprises!

Not feeling the rhythm? Try out an early version of our ASSIST MODE for some help!
